pages.title: Mana Infuser
pages.text: The Mana Infuser is required to infuse items with $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el. This can be used to transform a $(l:e_block_crystal_blocks)Deep Crystal Block/el into a $(l:e_block_crystal_blocks)Demon Crystal Block/el or to create $(l:e_item_magic_powder)Magic Powder/el.

During the infusion process, the machine needs a constant supply of $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el. This can be provided by $(l:e_mechanic_mana_linking)linking/el a $(l:e_mana_machine_sources)Mana source/el to the Mana Infuser.
